sentences.en: All were busily engaged, men at their ploughs , women at their looms.
sentences.cn: 大家都很忙, 男的耕田, 女的织布.

sentences.en: At least 17 different irregular units are engaged in the war.
sentences.cn: 至少有17个非正规军部队参战。

sentences.en: He was engaged at a salary of $ 1000 a month.
sentences.cn: 他以月薪一千美元受聘.

sentences.en: He was engaged to Miss Julia Maria Boardman.
sentences.cn: 他和朱莉娅·玛丽亚·博德曼小姐订婚了。

sentences.en: I have a large circle of friends and acquaintances engaged in photography.
My family has been engaged in farming for generations.
Our department has engaged a foreign teacher as phonetic adviser.
sentences.cn: 我们系已经聘请了一位外籍老师作为语音顾问.

sentences.en: Please wait a minute, he is engaged just now.
sentences.cn: 请稍等一会儿, 他正有事呢.

sentences.en: The London City Ballet has engaged two male dancers from the Bolshoi.
sentences.cn: 伦敦市芭蕾舞团从波修瓦芭蕾舞团聘来了两名男舞蹈演员。

sentences.en: The soldiers were engaged in hand - to - hand combat with the enemy.
sentences.cn: 战士们与敌人展开了肉搏.

sentences.en: We are engaged in a legal tussle with a large pharmaceutical company.
sentences.cn: 我们正同一家大制药公司闹法律纠纷.

sentences.en: We got engaged on my eighteenth birthday.
sentences.cn: 在我18岁生日那天我们订婚了。

sentences.en: We tried to call you back but you were engaged.
sentences.cn: 我们试着给你回电，但是你正在通话中。

sentences.en: When she said she was engaged I nearly fell off my chair.
sentences.cn: 她说她已订婚时,我几乎大吃一惊.

words.tran_cn: 从事；答应，保证；交战；啮合
吸引，占用；使参加；雇佣；使订婚；预定
保证；约定；同…订婚（engage的过去分词）

phrases.tran_cn: 与…有事商谈；接洽；忙于；从事于

trans.tran_cn: （指厕所等）有人用的，已订婚的，（指电话）占线的，忙碌的
trans.tran_en: a public toilet that is engaged is being used

trans.tran_cn: 与某人订婚，保证，约定，从事( engage的过去式和过去分词)，吸引或引起（注意、兴趣等）
